AmazongCliK effortlessly create affiliate links for Amazon products. Customize URL parameters, extract vital information, and optimize URLs. Take advantage of the following features:

1. Easy URL Parameter Management:

Customize and save extra URL parameters directly within the extension's options page. Whether it's maintaining specific tags, adding keywords, or including personalized link codes, our extension ensures affiliate links are tailored to your requirements.

2. Quick Extraction of Vital Information:

Say goodbye to manual data extraction. The extension automatically extracts the merchant ID and marketplace ID details from any Amazon product page with just a single click. It saves you valuable time and streamlines your affiliate link creation process.

3. URL Optimization for Enhanced User Experience:

We understand the importance of clean URLs. The extension removes unnecessary and cluttered data from affiliate links, providing a cleaner and more visually appealing browsing experience for your audience.

What are the most common use cases:

Affiliate marketers: Boost your earnings by effortlessly generating optimized affiliate links for Amazon products.

Content creators: Simplify the process of linking to Amazon products within your articles, blog posts, or social media content.

Website owners: Enhance user experience by ensuring clean and aesthetically pleasing URLs for affiliate links on your website.

Online shoppers: Easily share product links with your friends and followers while enjoying a clutter-free browsing experience.
